reviews.content: You made Deep Learning easy to approach, presented in a friendly and encouraging way, gave plenty of supporting resources, and even taught subtleties of Python along the way. Much appreciated!

Excellent course! Very engaging, paced just right, and most importantly - the theory is presented with the focus on developing your intuition, which is probably the most important thing you'll need if you plan on building your own architectures.
The course contents focus more on application and doesn't cover theories and scientific based for application.

The course got me into data science! It is a very good course, some lectures are repetitive and feel slow at at times but I do understand that some concepts are quite hard, the team do a excellent work at explaining these though.

Awesome! The deep learning A-Z course is very good for the beginner/advanced level. Step by step process is explained very precisely. All the practice materials are provided to get better hands-on practice. The instructor is highly knowledgeable about the topic. Highly recommend this course...Thank you.
This course was totally amazing! It steered me in the right direction and delivered exactly what I need to get started in the field of deep learning.

Supervised neural networks were well explained; very interesting the parts about SOMs and Boltzmann Machines, AutoEncoders could have been explored further particularly aiming to extract image embeddings

Props for the Intuition Lectures.

The Programming Lectures whrere a little bit overstretched.
Course materials met the expectations. Data sets are too simple in comparison to real-world problem. It could have been elaborated. Also project is missing.
I was complete Machine learning A-Z recently and think that this course would be on the same high level as it. The things are opens.

I really enjoy this course. I just wish there was an easier explanation initially for how to get the data. At the beginning of the course you are given multiple links and some are not quite relevant and it gets confusing. I prefer how the videos tell you, when you need it, where the data is.

I really love the complentary links from SuperDataScience and the ability to have these videos in written form so I can follow along instead of just listening, and also have the resources written down.

This course simple explains the different kinds of neural networks and the exercises that help you combined supervised and unsupervised models are much appreciated. Great effective intro that really can get you started, and sets you up to learn more.

Very nicely composed to give an intuitive flavor of the subject till most recent advancements. Also resources in additional reading learning section gives correct Mathematics behind corresponding topic.
I’m seeing extremely complicated things explained so simply that it makes all the other lessons I took on the topic make sense, when they didn’t before. Can’t recommend this course enough.
linear and logistic explaination should be from scratch (code for developing linear and logistic regression )

Great course!

The audio quality and loudness varies sometimes, but that doesn't matter much.

There are some mistakes in this course and the author doesn't reply to the questions.

I wish I didn't waste my time and since I have watched around half of the course I can't refund it.

Course is good in general but as an overview with little depth on Deep Neural networks , could have been better if added the math behind the concepts instead of just pointing to references , and no slides included in the material, just the code.

So far it is good. However I have to mention that I took a number of courses on the same subject on Brilliant.org which provided me with more fundamental starting point to understand the material presented so far.
Excellent balance between theoretical explanation and hands-on python code experience.
Last sections are same with machine learning course.
